title: Practical Implementation of a Twitter Sentiment Analysis System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Python Programming Proficiency, Fundamental Social Media Usage Experience, and Elementary Understanding of Data Analysis
context.additional_context: Course intensively developing competency in building sentiment analysis systems applicable to real-world tasks for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collect real-time data using the Twitter API
Learners can implement Python-based text preprocessing and sentiment analysis models
Learners can visualize analytical results and apply them to business decision-making
Learners can quantitatively measure positive/negative sentiment ratios for specific topics
Learners can explain methods for applying analytical systems across diverse industrial sectors
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
